message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: fskadjfhsakhdfshdas! why does Netflix keep canceling all my favorite shows?!
Him: I know, right?! Must be run by a bunch of cringe-worthy executives who don't know quality when they see it.

CONVERSATION 2
Her: skufhew9qwujsldvnmaj! I can't believe people still wear Crocs. Are we living in some alternate universe?
Him: Seriously, who gave them the green light to be a fashion statement? Maybe they're trying to bring back the medieval vibes.

CONVERSATION 3
Her: ksdflsdjfojfeoiduvg! I can't even right now. Why do people put pineapples on pizza? It's an abomination!
Him: Haha, it's like they're trying to sabotage the deliciousness of pizza. Pineapples belong on the beach, not on our slices!

CONVERSATION 4
Her: lkdfbwe89qweiruqwoij! How can anyone find Nickelback appealing? Their music is like a never-ending headache.
Him: Totally agree, it's like they're the kings of turning good songs into dentist waiting room background music. No cap.

CONVERSATION 5
Her: aksdfiwkef9q83uy4tl!! Can we talk about how texting has ruined grammar? I can't stand all the abbreviations!
Him: Lol, I feel you. It's like the English language went on a vacation and left us with this cryptic alphabet soup. SMH.
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)
    ,
    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : fiwugvsydcjkzx/lds,k.ajluyladifbgrjdkzsl. wtf. what drug are you on?. how is ben barnes anything but a 10000000000000000/10?.  
    Him : Him : in the prince caspian movies i mean. not ben barnes in general. 
    
    The 5 Conversations must have unique messages for her and him. The prompt for 'her' must be different everytime.
